content: **materials** this pattern can be completed in any color use two tones of any medium weight yarn like bernat maker or easy peasy in darker color color a lighter color color b black pink optional 2 × 10mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease back loop only blo front loop only flo fasten_off embroidery
